about_the_game:
Exciting turn-based strategy and supernatural investigation game where you dive into the dark world of paranormal creatures. As part of the Monster Hunters organization, your mission is to identify, hunt, and capture creatures like ghosts, vampires, demons, doppelgängers, and animatronics, while uncovering the dark secrets hidden among humans.

Key Features:

  • Monster investigation and hunting: Interrogate suspects and use advanced tools like the vampire mirror and EMF meter to reveal who is a monster.

  • Turn-based strategy: Every encounter challenges you to make tactical decisions, with dynamic combat where you'll use items like silver bullets and holy water.

  • Multiple supernatural entities: Face over 7 different types of creatures, each with their own weaknesses and special abilities.

  • Skill development and inventory customization: Upgrade your hunting tools and abilities as you face increasingly powerful monsters.

  • Immersive narrative: Uncover the dark secrets monsters hide among humans as you solve the mysteries surrounding each case.

If you’re passionate about supernatural horror and tactical games, "That's My Monster: Neighbor Among Us" offers a unique experience, filled with tension, strategic decisions, and a mysterious atmosphere.

Are you ready to face the supernatural and become the ultimate hunter? The hidden truth is waiting for you!
